page.title: 12FASHION,EATING AND LEISURE
page.content: Among young people in Strathaven the height of fashion this year is:- {HAIRSTYLES}----BOBBED,SPIKED,SPIRAL PERM,CROPPED AND DEMMYWAVE.{ {FOOTWEAR}---WHITE BOOTS,SANDLES,WINKLE PICKERS,ANKLE BOOTS,TUCKER BOOTS AND WRINKLED SHOES. {FASHION WEAR}--TIGHT JEANS,V BACK TOPS,BAT WING TOPS,SLASH NECKS,STRAIGHT SKIRTS IN PASTEL COLOURS,BAGGY TROUSERS,JUMP SUITS,FISH TAILS,SKI TOPS,BIG BUTTON TOPS,PASTEL JACKETS,BAGGY TOPS,U NECK TOPS AND ANKLE SOCKS. {JEWELRY} ---BIG BUTTON EARRINGS,LONG CHAINS,PLASTIC EARINGS,RINGS,BEADS,BANGLES,BROOCHES AND GOLD JEWELRY. In other words almost anything.Eyeliner,eyeshadow and lipstick are also common.Cafes and pubs are the main places for socialising.Bingo is very popular with people of all ages.Restaurants include a Chinese and an Italian.
